titleStmt.title: Festered consciences new launced: or, tith-paying defended against William Westup and Thomas Puckle Penned by way of an epistle to every one, who had rather disburden his purse then burden his conscience. By Hierophilus, a young fencer.
titleStmt.author: Havighurst, Johannes, b. 1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for W. Weekley, and are to be sold at Ipswich,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Newberry Library.
